cards.rules_text: Exile up to X target nonland permanents. Then, for each of those permanents you owned, return them to the battlefield under your control. Return the rest to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

When M'aiq, Quick Witted enters the battlefield or a player mills one or more cards, exile up to one card from a graveyard. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, copy it, except it isn't legendary. You may choose new targets for it.
cards.notes: “Many are the stories M'aiq knows! Some of them are even true.”

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, draw a card for each of its colors, then discard two cards.
